lead_paragraph: LONDON, Dec. 1 (U.P.) -- The Italian military situation, steadily deteriorating under Allied blows and internal dissension, has sent Premier Mussolini to bed, seriously ill of heart disease, it was reported today.
abstract: Possible role in separate Ital peace pact seen

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: VICTOR EMMANUEL III, KING OF ITALY

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
